00028 #include "midas.h"
00029 #include "msystem.h"
00030 
00031 /* Select the hardware interface */
00032 #include "camacnul.c"           /* for code debugging no hardware involved */
00033                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "camacrpc.c" *//* Use Midas frontend driver (FCNA) */
00034                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "camlinux.c" *//* for the Direct CAMAC from Linux PC box */
00035                                                                                                                                                                     /* #include "ces8210.c"  *//* for the CES8210 VME CAMAC interface */
00036 
00037 #include "esone.c"              /* Declare esone standard (cdreg,cfsa...) */
00038 
00039 #define FRAME_TO_CHANNEL 0
00040 #define CHANNEL_TO_FRAME 1
00041 
00042 #define CAEN170A_STR "\
00043 Branch = INT : 0\n\
00044 Crate  = INT : 7\n\
00045 Station  = INT : 1\n\
00046 Mainframe = INT[16] :\n\
00047 [0] 11\n\
00048 [1] 21\n\
00049 [2]  0\n\
00050 [3]  0\n\
00051 [4]  0\n\
00052 [5]  0\n\
00053 [6]  0\n\
00054 [7]  0\n\
00055 [8]  0\n\
00056 [9]  0\n\
00057 [10]  0\n\
00058 [11]  0\n\
00059 [12]  0\n\
00060 [13]  0\n\
00061 [14]  0\n\
00062 [15]  0\n\
00063 "
00064 
00065 /* Specific to the CAEN170A HV control structure */
00066 static struct {
00067    INT branch;
00068    INT crate;
00069    INT station;
00070    INT mainframe[16];
00071    INT ext0;
00072    INT ext1;
00073    unsigned long st;
00074 } caen;
00075 
00076 /*---- device driver routines ------------------------------------------------*/
00077 
00078 INT caen170a_init(HNDLE hKeyRoot, INT index, INT channels)
00079 {
00080    INT status, size, q;
00081    HNDLE hKeyFrame;
00082    HNDLE hDB;
00083 
00084    cm_get_experiment_database(&hDB, NULL);
00085 
00086    status = db_create_record(hDB, hKeyRoot, "", CAEN170A_STR);
00087    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00088       cm_msg(MERROR, "caen170a_init", "Cannot create BCN_Mainframe\n");
00089       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00090    }
00091    size = sizeof(caen.branch);
00092    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Branch", &caen.branch, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00093    if (status != DB_SUCCESS) {
00094       cm_msg(MINFO, "caen170a_init",
00095              "Cannot find 'Branch' entry in ../Devices/HV170A database");
00096       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00097    }
00098    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Crate", &caen.crate, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00099    status = db_get_value(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Station", &caen.station, &size, TID_INT, TRUE);
00100    size = sizeof(caen.mainframe);
00101    status = db_find_key(hDB, hKeyRoot, "Mainframe", &hKeyFrame);
00102    status = db_get_data(hDB, hKeyFrame, &caen.mainframe[0], &size, TID_INT);
00103 
00104    /* save ext for HV slot */
00105    cdreg(&caen.ext0, caen.branch, caen.crate, caen.station, 0);
00106    cdreg(&caen.ext1, caen.branch, caen.crate, caen.station, 1);
00107    cfsa(24, caen.ext1, &caen.st, &q);
00108    cfsa(9, caen.ext1, &caen.st, &q);
00109 
00110    return FE_SUCCESS;
00111 }
00112

00114 
00115 INT caen170a_exit(INT index)
00116 {
00117    return FE_SUCCESS;
00118 }
00119 
00120 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00121 INT caen170a_assign_channel(INT direction, INT * channel, INT * frame, INT * chanframe)
00122 {
00123    INT ch;
00124 
00125    ch = *channel;
00126 
00127    switch (direction) {
00128    case FRAME_TO_CHANNEL:
00129       printf("caen170a_assign_channel: FRAME_TO_CHANNEL not implemented\n");
00130       break;
00131    case CHANNEL_TO_FRAME:
00132       *frame = caen.mainframe[(ch / 64)];
00133       *chanframe = (ch % 64);
00134 #ifdef DEBUG
00135       printf("%i ->", ch);
00136       printf(" %i %i ", *frame, *chanframe);
00137 #endif
00138       break;
00139    }
00140    return FE_SUCCESS;
00141 }
00142 
00143 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00144 INT caen170a_set(INT index, INT channel, float fvalue)
00145 {
00146    INT cmd, frame, fch, nlam, q, status, value, svalue;
00147 
00148    value = (INT) abs(fvalue);
00149 
00150    /* convert channel to frame and channel within frame */
00151    if (caen170a_assign_channel(CHANNEL_TO_FRAME, &channel, &frame, &fch) < 0)
00152       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00153 
00154    /* Clear buffer */
00155    cfsa(9, caen.ext0, &caen.st, &q);
00156 
00157    /* HAS to be there! */
00158    ss_sleep(400);
00159 
00160    /* host */
00161    status = 1;
00162    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, &caen.st, &q);
00163 
00164    /* crate */
00165    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &frame, &q);
00166 
00167    /* operation 0x05.. Set relay OFF , .. channel# */
00168    /* operation 0x04.. Set relay ON , .. channel# */
00169    /* operation 0x03.. write Vset, .. channel# */
00170    cmd = 0x0300 | (fch & 0xff);
00171    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &cmd, &q);
00172 
00173    /* set HV */
00174    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &value, &q);
00175 
00176    /* ship op request */
00177    status = 1;
00178    cfsa(17, caen.ext0, &caen.st, &q);
00179 
00180    /* HAS to be there! */
00181    ss_sleep(300);
00182    nlam = 0;
00183    do {
00184       ss_sleep(100);
00185       cfsa(0, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &svalue, &q);
00186       nlam++;
00187    } while ((nlam < 10) && (q != 1));
00188 
00189    /* decode value */
00190    /* error returned :
00191       0xff00 : busy.
00192       0xff01 : unknown code or erro in the request.
00193       0xff02 : no channel present.
00194       0xff03 : Vset > HVin.
00195       0xff04 : HVin > 1500 ON command not enabled.
00196       0xff05 : Config number > 9.
00197       0xfffd : No data transmitted.
00198       0xfffe : The master ID is incorrect.
00199       0xffff : The address slave does not exist.
00200     */
00201    cfsa(0, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &svalue, &q);
00202 
00203 #ifdef DEBUG
00204    printf(" - value :0x%x - value:%i - qx:%i : nlam:%i\n", svalue, svalue, q, nlam);
00205 #endif
00206 
00207    return FE_SUCCESS;
00208 }
00209 
00210 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00211 
00212 INT caen170a_set_all(INT index, INT channels, float value)
00213 {
00214    INT i;
00215 
00216    for (i = 0; i < channels; i++) {
00217       caen170a_set(index, i, value);
00218       cm_yield(0);              /* check for watchdog requests */
00219    }
00220 
00221    return FE_SUCCESS;
00222 }
00223 
00224 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00225 
00226 INT caen170a_get(INT index, INT channel, float *pvalue)
00227 {
00228    INT cmd, frame, fch;
00229    INT nlam, q;
00230    INT value;
00231 
00232    /* convert channel to frame and channel within frame */
00233    if (caen170a_assign_channel(CHANNEL_TO_FRAME, &channel, &frame, &fch) < 0)
00234       return FE_ERR_ODB;
00235 
00236    /* clear LAM */
00237    cfsa(9, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &cmd, &q);
00238 
00239    /* HAS to be there! */
00240    ss_sleep(400);
00241 
00242    /* host = 1 */
00243    cmd = 1;
00244    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &cmd, &q);
00245 
00246    /* mainframe CAEN address */
00247    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &frame, &q);
00248 
00249    /* operation 0x0000 Read Module name */
00250    /* operation 0x02.. Read Vset , .. channel# */
00251    /* operation 0x01.. Read Vmon , .. channel# */
00252    cmd = 0x0100 | (fch & 0xff);
00253    cfsa(16, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &cmd, &q);
00254 
00255    /* ship op request */
00256    cmd = 1;
00257    cfsa(17, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &cmd, &q);
00258 
00259    /* HAS to be there! */
00260    ss_sleep(400);
00261 
00262    nlam = 0;
00263    do {
00264       ss_sleep(100);
00265       cfsa(0, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &value, &q);
00266       nlam++;
00267    } while ((nlam < 10) && (q != 1));
00268 
00269    /* read data & decode value remove relay status (bit 15) if below error status */
00270    cfsa(0, caen.ext0, (unsigned long *) &value, &q);
00271    /* error returned :
00272       0xff00 : busy.
00273       0xff01 : unknown code or erro in the request.
00274       0xff02 : no channel present.
00275       0xff03 : Vset > HVin.
00276       0xff04 : HVin > 1500 ON command not enabled.
00277       0xff05 : Config number > 9.
00278       0xfffd : No data transmitted.
00279       0xfffe : The master ID is incorrect.
00280       0xffff : The address slave does not exist.
00281     */
00282    if (value < 0xff00)
00283       *pvalue = (float) (value & 0x7fff);
00284 
00285 #ifdef DEBUG
00286    printf(" - value :0x%x - value:%f - qx:%i : nlam:%i\n", value, *pvalue, q, nlam);
00287 #endif
00288 
00289    return FE_SUCCESS;
00290 }
00291 
00292 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00293 INT caen170a_get_all(INT index, INT channels, float *array)
00294 {
00295    float value;
00296    INT i;
00297 
00298    /* read ALL this equip channels */
00299    for (i = 0; i <= channels; i++) {
00300       caen170a_get(index, i, (float *) &value);
00301       array[i] = (float) value;
00302       cm_yield(0);              /* check for watchdog requests */
00303    }
00304    return FE_SUCCESS;
00305 }
00306 
00307 /*----------------------------------------------------------------------------*/
00308 /*---- device driver entry point -----------------------------------*/
00309 INT caen170a(INT cmd, ...)
00310 {
00311    va_list argptr;
00312    HNDLE hKey;
00313    INT channel, status, index;
00314    float value, *pvalue;
00315 
00316    va_start(argptr, cmd);
00317    status = FE_SUCCESS;
00318 
00319    switch (cmd) {
00320    case CMD_INIT:
00321       hKey = va_arg(argptr, HNDLE);
00322       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00323       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00324       status = caen170a_init(hKey, index, channel);
00325       break;
00326 
00327    case CMD_EXIT:
00328       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00329       status = caen170a_exit(index);
00330       break;
00331 
00332    case CMD_SET:
00333       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00334       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00335       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00336 #ifdef DEBUG
00337       printf("in caen170a cmd set ->:%i -chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, value);
00338 #endif
00339       status = caen170a_set(index, channel, value);
00340       break;
00341 
00342    case CMD_SET_ALL:
00343       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00344       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00345       value = (float) va_arg(argptr, double);
00346 #ifdef DEBUG
00347       printf("in caen170a cmd set all:%i -chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, value);
00348 #endif
00349       status = caen170a_set_all(index, channel, value);
00350       break;
00351 
00352    case CMD_GET:
00353       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00354       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00355       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00356       status = caen170a_get(index, channel, pvalue);
00357 #ifdef DEBUG
00358       printf("in caen170a cmd get <-:%i -Chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, *pvalue);
00359 #endif
00360       break;
00361 
00362    case CMD_GET_ALL:
00363       index = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00364       channel = va_arg(argptr, INT);
00365       pvalue = va_arg(argptr, float *);
00366       status = caen170a_get_all(index, channel, pvalue);
00367 #ifdef DEBUG
00368       printf("in caen170a cmd get all:%i -Chan:%i -Val:%f ", cmd, channel, *pvalue);
00369 #endif
00370       break;
00371 
00372       /* current measurements not supported in CAEN170A */
00373 
00374    case CMD_GET_CURRENT:
00375       break;
00376 
00377    case CMD_GET_CURRENT_ALL:
00378       break;
00379 
00380    case CMD_SET_CURRENT_LIMIT:
00381       break;
00382 
00383    default:
00384       cm_msg(MERROR, "caen170a device driver", "Received unknown command %d", cmd);
00385       status = FE_ERR_DRIVER;
00386       break;
00387    }
00388    va_end(argptr);
00389 
00390    return status;
00391 }
